summary: Provides comprehensive unit tests for the Kandinsky combined diffusion pipelines (text-to-image, image-to-image, and inpainting), checking component initialization, input handling, output consistency across formats, halfâ€‘precision inference, batch versus single inference parity, resource offloading, and model save/load behavior.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, stability, and performance of Kandinsky combined pipelines to ensure reliable integration and deployment within the diffusion framework.
